description: Try our easy to follow Pork Loin Cutlets with Pear & Fennel Braise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork cutlet,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Pear,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pork Loin Cutlets with Pear & Fennel Braise Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 small fennel bulbs, trimmed, thickly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Brush pork with a little of the oil and season. Heat a frying pan over medium-high heat. Add pork and brown on both sides, then reduce heat to medium and cook for 5 minutes. Transfer to an ovenproof dish and bake for 8-10 minutes until cooked through.

Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in the same pan over medium-low heat. Add the fennel and cook, stirring often for 5 minutes until soft. Add pear, lemon rind, thyme and cider and simmer gently for 5 minutes or until thickened slightly.
Remove pork from oven and stir any juices into fennel mixture. Spoon onto plates and top with pork to serve.
